snippet: The playoff-tested Brad Richards, who won a Stanley Cup with Tampa Bay in 2004, joined the Rangers this season and led the team in assists.
abstract: New York Rangers are looking to their playoff-tested center Brad Richards to lead the way as they head into the first round of the NHL playoffs; Richards, who won a Stanley Cup with Tampa Bay in 2004, joined the Rangers this season and led the team in assists.
lead_paragraph: The playoff-tested Brad Richards, who won a Stanley Cup with Tampa Bay in 2004, joined the Rangers this season and led the team in assists.

headline.seo: Brad Richards, Cup Veteran, Leads Rangers Into Playoffs
headline.main: Rangers Look to a Veteran to Show the Way
headline.print_headline: Rangers Look to a Veteran to Show the Way
